title: League of Legend OCE Problems
body: My League keeps crashing or disconnecting even if I am not disconnected. Riot please look into this cause i have waited for a long time just to get into a game. {{item:3041}}

replies.body: The game is unplayable for me at the moment.  In between 999 ping and client constantly not responding, or the 6 disconnects, I spent 20 minutes and lost a game. Those LoL servers.....
